scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others -c yellow,magenta -n CLIENT,SERVER "npm --prefix client/ run dev" "npm --prefix server/ run dev"
scripts.install:server: cd server && npm i && npm run compile
scripts.install:build:client: cd client/ && npm install && npm run build
scripts.fulldeploy:heroku: npm install && npm run install:build:client && git add . && git commit -m " deploy to heroku " &&  git push heroku master
